short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly add collaborators to your email drafts in Gmail and Google Workspace. Get help writing, feedback or approval to send.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant collaboration: âœ¨
ðŸ’Œ Click the coedit button in your Gmail draft window
ðŸ”— An invite link is created and copied to your clipboard
ðŸ’¬ Send the invite link (message, slack, etc) to anyone you want to coauthor your draft with you

This is perfect for saying the right thing the first time â€” now your team can help you get the communication clear without emailing edits back and forth. It's way faster than making and sharing docs, but the same real-time collaboration.

Your coeditors can open the link on any device and instantly collaborate, they don't need to create accounts or login. Only you can send your email.

This extension will not ever access your inbox, just the draft text when you push the coedit button. This free beta version is for non-commercial use only.

All you need is a Google account and collaborators to help you write. 

Do you have ideas for improving coedit.email or see an issue? 
Please let us know: help@coedit.email
